name: Seek and Destroy-Battle Unleashed
description:
If you like challenging FPS game then you will find "Seek and Destroy-Battle Unleashed" keeping you on the edge. You are on a mission to take back your space station “Artek” from unknown invaders!!

The objective is simple "Seek" the intruders and "Destroy" them!

Players do get a chance to get special reward for completing the game!

------------------------------ Donate and helps us to create more fun games for you :)
